    public interface LifeCycle2
extends LifeCycle
    Extends the LifeCycle interface.

    This interface should be merged with the super-interface in 3.0.

    从以下版本开始:
    2.7

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean stop(long timeout, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Blocks until all tasks have completed execution after a shutdown request, or the timeout occurs, or the current thread is interrupted, whichever happens first.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.logging.log4j.core.LifeCycle

        getState, initialize, isStarted, isStopped, start, stop

    • 方法详细资料

      • stop

        boolean stop(long timeout,
             TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Blocks until all tasks have completed execution after a shutdown request, or the timeout occurs, or the current thread is interrupted, whichever happens first.
        参数:
        timeout - the maximum time to wait
        timeUnit - the time unit of the timeout argument
        返回:
        true if the receiver was stopped cleanly and normally, false otherwise.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.7
